title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - AI-LEAP: India's Pioneering Step in AI Education
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: Musk says work could become ‘optional’ and more like a ‘hobby’ as AI era accelerates
description: Musk has said that work could become optional within the next two decades, as rapid advances in artificial intelligence and robotics reshape the nature of human labour.
content:
Tesla and SpaceX CEO Elon Musk has predicted that working may become optional in the future, driven by advances in artificial intelligence (AI) and robotics.

title: Google's AI chip push spurs hope for Samsung, SK hynix

title: Australia-India-Canada launch new tech alliance: What it means for businesses and jobs
description: Australia, India and Canada have announced the ACITI (Australia-Canada-India Technology and Innovation Partnership) at the G20 Summit in Johannesburg. The trilateral alliance focuses on critical minerals, clean energy, artificial intelligence, green hydrogen and nuclear energy cooperation promising mining jobs, skilled migration pathways, and business opportunities. In this podcast, we speak to Deepak Raj-Gupta OAM, National Chair of Australia India Business Council, to explore what outcomes this partnership could deliver for Australians and Indians.
content: Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi (C), Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney, and Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese meet within the G20 Leaders Summit in Johannesburg, South Africa, on November 22, 2025; Inset: Deepak-Raj Gupta OAM is the Na... [1886 chars]
